So it fit true to size other than length.  I would need to grown between 4 to 6 inches for it to hit at my ankles. The dress is good but this white floral pattern material is really see through. I thought it would be fine with a slip, but no it isn't. Even with my slip, you can see my all my undergarments. Not a happy customer.

I am about 5’4”, ~160lbs & a 36D. I normally wear a medium in most clothing items but I sized up & got a large in the dark grey floral & it fit perfectly. It was not too tight (I don’t normally like things to be super fitted), it fit my bust, the length fell right at my ankle. Some people said they felt it was see through, or they had issues with the pockets - but I experienced neither of these. My dress was not see through at all, my hands fit in both pockets & they didn’t stick out weird or make the dress look strange.
Very comfortable and heavier, in a good way. than expected. Fit with a bit of space. Great buy!

I really, really wanted to love this dress. The mint green tie-die colors are really pretty and it was so cute just standing still in front of the mirror. But it needs some quality improvements.  One of the pockets had a tear where the seam wasn’t sewn completely. It also had static cling which seemed odd to me for the type of fabric it is made of.  I have about 15 dresses of this type that are made with this stretchy, silky t-shirt fabric, and I’ve never encountered one with static. I’m 5 feet tall and the length was about 2- 3 inches too long, but I would have definitely kept it and hemmed it if it didn’t have the other issues.
